column4: ok.. I have 2 hard disks, each 160GB on a Dell poweredge T105. is there anything special I need to load ubuntu server?

to make things easier.. check the wiring of each drive to the motherboard.. make sure that drive 1 is in the drive1 slot on the motherboard and the same for drive 2.. then make sure your boot order is in sequence for the drives.. it will work reguardless but sometimes with 2 drives you'll install and then you end up reinstalling to boot loader to the right drive.
